name: Cattiva

ability.name: Cat Helper
ability.description: While in team, Cattiva helps carry supplies, increasing the player's max carrying capacity.

description:
At a glance it appears full of confidence, but it is in fact weak and cowardly.
Being toyed with by a Cattiva is in many ways the greatest of disgraces.

skills.name: Punch Flurry
skills.description: Cattiva's special skill. Pursues enemies, repeatedly punching them with both its fists.

skills.name: Air Cannon
skills.description: Quickly fires a burst of highly pressurized air.

skills.name: Sand Blast
skills.description: Hurls sticky mud at an enemy.

skills.name: Power Shot
skills.description: Charges energy into a focused blast.

skills.name: Wind Cutter
skills.description: Fires a high speed blade of wind that flies straight at an enemy.

skills.name: Seed Machine Gun
skills.description: Fires a volley of hard seeds at enemies in front of it.

skills.name: Pal Blast
skills.description: Charges destructive energy before firing a high-powered beam forward across a wide area.
